# seek

**Type Property**

An event that indicates a change to the current playback location.

## Declaration

```swift
static let seek: GroupSessionEvent.Action
```

## Getting playback-related actions

- **play**: An action that indicates the start of playback.
- **pause**: An action that indicates an end to playback.
- **skip(item:)**: Returns an event that indicates a skipped track or playback item.

items.description: An action that indicates the start of playback.
items.name: play

items.description: An action that indicates an end to playback.
items.name: pause

items.description: Returns an event that indicates a skipped track or playback item.
